turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey. I need to order a mocha cappuccino with 2% milk from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what size did you want?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want anything else from starbucks today?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. which starbucks should i place the order at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on Fifth Avenue in Downtown Chicago?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 1 venti mocha frappuccino with 2% milk from the starbucks on 5th avenue in downtown chicago will be $5.45. should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, the order has been placed. it'll b ready for pick up in 10 mins.
